explains: n. 复杂性，错综复杂；复杂之处，费解之处
wordGroup: complexity analysis 复杂度分析；成分分析

sentences.en: I was astonished by the size and complexity of the problem.
sentences.cn: 这个问题的复杂性和涉及面之广使我感到惊讶。

sentences.en: An open-science stance can also add complexity to a collaboration.
sentences.cn: 开放科学的立场也会增加协作的复杂性。
